snippet.title: IMPOSTER THE HORROR | Android Game Trailer | 2021 by BekoCan Games
snippet.description:
⚠ Google Play Link: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.BekoCanGames.ImposterTheHorror

Welcome to Imposter The Horror. It will connect you to yourself with its atmosphere and mechanics. This game is fully fan-made and all rights belong to BekoCan Games. There are no rights violations. Let's move on to the details of this unique experience.

♦ Features:
• Realistic graphics.
• Easy controls.
• Beautiful mechanics.
• Feeling of fear.
• Smooth gameplay.

♦ How to play the game?
• Trapped in the oxygen chamber of the space base. There's an Imposter after you. Your room has a certain power capacity. You have to use it very carefully, otherwise it won't have very good results. You can see imposter's location from the camera in the room. Remember, cameras consume electricity, too. But don't worry, the radio and oxygen device won't consume their electricity. There are three places the Imposter can come from. Two are main doors (A and B), and one is ventilation (V). All of this consumes electricity when it's turned off, so keep it on when it's not in danger.
 Impostor disrupts the cameras as he leaves his location. For that, you have to turn the main switch off and on. Of course, you can use the main switch in emergencies. It instantly cuts off all electricity usage. 
 Your main goal is to radio the main base around the world to get help. Follow the top left of the screen for this. When type "ready," you can enter a new frequency. You have a countdown after every frequency. You have to survive in that time. 
 At the top right of the screen is the oxygen level for room. When this level drops below 50%, you can release oxygen into the room. For this, go to the computer and start the process.

♠ GOOD LUCK ♠

⚠ DISCLAIMER:
Imposter The Horror is an unofficial version and is not endorsed by InnerSloth or affiliated with the creator of this game or its licensers. This game takes after the reasonable use rules by US law, in the event that you feel there is an immediate copyright or trademark infringement that does not take after inside of the reasonable use rules, please get in touth with us specifically. 
 All rights belong to BekoCan Games.

◘ E-mail for Contact: info@bekocangames.com
